sentence: Senate candidate Herschel Walker wasnt the only big name to skip U.S. Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greenes pro-gun rally.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Prepare for surprises this week in Georgia politics

sentence: AGRICULTURE COMMISSIONER Agriculture Commissioner Gary Black isnt seeking reelection, opting instead to run for U.S. Senate in the Republican primary that includes former football great Herschel Walker.
title: Incumbents in Georgia face primary opponents down the ballot
